parameters.name: botAliasId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot alias to delete.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot associated with the alias to delete.

nested_items.name: botAliasId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot alias to delete.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot that contains the alias to delete.

nested_items.name: botAliasStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the alias. The status is Deleting while the alias is in the process of being deleted. Once the alias is deleted, it will no longer appear in the list of aliases returned by the ListBotAliases operation.
